name: Color Fuel
description:
My submission for the Cartridge Jam 3 Game Jam, Color Fuel!  

Use color fuel to boost and lay colors.  

Laying colors allows you to take control of roads. 

The more roads you control, the faster your color fuel regenerates.

Drive over your colors to gain a slight increase to max speed. Other players' colors will slightly decrease your max speed.

Default GamePad controls. You can also change controls in options:
Up - Look Backwards
Left/Right - Steer
Down - Reverse
A - Accelerate. Double tap to boost/drop color
B - Brake
Right Shoulder - Use Weapon/drop color

Default keyboard controls(Player 1) :
Up arrow - Look backwards
Left/Right arrows to steer
Down arrow - reverse
Z - Accelerate. Double tap to boost/drop color /Also confirm on menus
X - Brake
Space - Weapon
These keyboard defaults are setup as per the DSOP arcade cab requirements. (no idea how well or terribly this will work with arcade controls!) 

This is my second game jam using Unity and also my second "finished" game. Pardon the AI, they are pretty janky, as is the driving. I have a feeling this game is more fun with friends.  I recommend you use a controller, but controls are configurable through the option menu.
